pages.text: Everywhere it rattles and fizzles, whistles and smokes. An ensemble of Assemblage.\\Surely a few of those machines will come in handy.

pages.title: Crushing Gemstones
pages.text: [#](bb00bb)Gemstones[#]() can be crushed, yielding some [#](bb00bb)Gemstone Powder[#]().

pages.title: Milling Leaves
pages.text: [#](bb00bb)Colored Leaves[#]() can be crushed, yielding [#](bb00bb)Pigment[#]() and a higher chance for [#](bb00bb)Colored Saplings[#]().

pages.title: Crushing Colored Logs
pages.text: Crushing [#](449900)Colored Logs[#]() results in some additional [#](449900)Pigment[#]().

pages.title: Milling Quitoxic Reeds
pages.text: $(l:resources/quitoxic_reeds)Quitoxic Reeds$() can be milled into powder.

pages.title: Milling Frostbite Crystal
pages.text: Milling $(l:resources/liquid_crystal_essences)Frostbite Crystal$() will yield you a nice amount of [#](bb00bb)Frostbite Essence[#]().

pages.title: Milling Blazing Crystal
pages.text: Milling $(l:resources/liquid_crystal_essences)Blazing Crystal$() will yield you a nice amount of [#](bb00bb)Incandescent Essence[#]().
